actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to repeal section 3108 of title 5, United States Code, which prohibits the employment by the Federal and District of Columbia governments of individuals employed by detective agencies.

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of Federal law which prohibit the employment by the Federal and District of Columbia Governments of individuals employed by detective agencies. (Amends 5 USC 3108).

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 3108 of title 5, United States Code, which prohibits the employment by the Federal and District of Columbia governments of individuals employed by detective agencies.
